thread.section_title: Stoneside Blinds & Shades Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Stoneside Blinds & Shades | www.stoneside.com
thread.title: Stephanie Glidden
thread.title_full: Stoneside Blinds & Shades reviewed by Stephanie Glidden

author: Stephanie Glidden
title: Stephanie Glidden
text:
We were exceptionally pleased with Kathy Mays of Stoneside Blinds & Shades. We hadn't purchased window coverings in more than a decade. She walked us through what would work best in our new condo, came prepared with tons of samples and advice on what be our best choice. She measured precisely and made sure we understood exactly what we were ordering. It arrived precisely when she said it would. The shades in our stairwell and guest bedroom made an extraordinary difference in the amount of heat the house retains, we were very pleased with that as well as loving the way they look.
We highly recommend her, she's a true professional.
